verses.verse: So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> he and his <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that belonged to him; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with him.
Now <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>rich<s%> in <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> in <S%H3701>silver<s%> and in <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H4550>journeys<s%> from the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%>

to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7223>formerly;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> could not <S%H5375>sustain<s%> them while <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%> for their <S%H7399>possessions<s%> were so <S%H7227>great<s%> that they were not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>

And there was <S%H7379>strife<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of Abram's <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of Lot's <S%H4735>livestock.<s%> Now the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> were <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Then <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let there be <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4808>strife<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and me, nor <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> and your <S%H7462>herdsmen,<s%> for we are <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

"Is not the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you? <S%H4994>Please<s%> <S%H6504>separate<s%> from me: <S%H518>if<s%> [to] the <S%H8040>left,<s%> then I will <S%H3231>go<s%> to the <S%H3231>right;<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> [to] the <S%H3225>right,<s%> then I will <S%H8041>go<s%> to the <S%H8041>left.<s%>"

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>valley<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that it was <S%H4945>well<s%> <S%H4945>watered<s%> <S%H3605>everywhere<s%> – [this was] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> – like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> like the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

So <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> for himself <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>valley<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H6924>eastward.<s%> Thus they <S%H6504>separated<s%> from <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H251>other.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3427>settled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> while <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>settled<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>valley,<s%> and <S%H167>moved<s%> his <S%H167>tents<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom.<s%>
Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> were <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> had <S%H6504>separated<s%> from him, <S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are, <S%H6828>northward<s%> and <S%H5045>southward<s%> and <S%H9506>eastward<s%> and <S%H3220>westward;<s%>
for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>see,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you and to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> that <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H4487>number<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> then your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> can <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>
<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> about the <S%H776>land<s%> through its <S%H753>length<s%> and <S%H7341>breadth;<s%> for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you."

Then <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H167>moved<s%> his <S%H167>tent<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
